dpath_bids.description: This directory contains the raw dataset converted to the BIDS standard.

dpath_derivatives.description: This directory contains the outputs of image processing pipelines. Outputs of different pipelines are stored in `<pipeline_name>/<pipeline_version>` subdirectories. Each subdirectory has two additional subdirectories: one for the actual output (under `output`) and one for temporary files created during processing (under `work`).

dpath_sourcedata.description: This directory is for the organized source data that is ready for BIDS conversion.

dpath_downloads.description: This directory is for downloaded data archives (e.g., tarballs or zipped files).

dpath_releases.description: This directory is for dataset releases (e.g., associated with specific publications).

dpath_proc.description: This directory is for storing the Nipoppy configuration information and custom code.

dpath_containers.description: This directory is for storing the container image files for the BIDS conversion/processing pipelines.

dpath_descriptors.description: This directory is for storing Boutiques descriptors for user-added pipelines

dpath_invocations.description: This directory is for storing Boutiques invocations for processing pipelines.

dpath_tracker_configs.description: This directory is for storing tracker configurations for processing pipelines.

dpath_pybids.description: This directory is for PyBIDS-specific data/configurations.

dpath_bids_db.description: This directory is for PyBIDS databases generated/used during processing.

dpath_bids_ignore_patterns.description: This directory is for storing ignore patterns to be used by PyBIDS during dataset indexing.

dpath_scratch.description: This directory is for scratch data.

dpath_raw_imaging.description: This directory is for raw, unorganized imaging file dumps.

dpath_tabular.description: This directory is for tabular/phenotypic data.

dpath_assessments.description: This directory is for assessments data.

dpath_demographics.description: This directory is for demographics data.

fpath_config.description: The configuration file for a dataset is where all data processing is configured.

fpath_doughnut.description: The doughnut file is generated/updated internally and is used to keep track of the raw data organization and BIDS conversion process.

fpath_manifest.description: The manifest file lists all expected study participants and visits.

fpath_imaging_bagel.description: The imaging bagel file lists availability of derived imaging data and pipeline processing statuses.
